document.full_text: trevor cahill came out on top in a pitching duel with ricky romero, tossing eight brilliant innings to pick up his first win of the season as the oakland athletics edged the toronto blue jays 2-1 on thursday.
document.title: cahill wins pitchers' duel as athletics edge blue jays
lines_and_colors: trevor cahill came out on top in a pitching duel with ricky romero, tossing eight brilliant innings to pick up his first win of the season as the oakland athletics edged the toronto blue jays 2-1 on thursday.
